Articles.Content: I recently reverted from 1.5 to 1.4.5 and now when I right click on a part, like a docking port, "Aim here" or whatever it was is gone. No part at all has this option anymore. I'm not sure if I can fix this or not. Any suggestions would be appreciated.
Advanced Tweakables needs to be on for that.  I believe it's under your difficulty settings?  Might be the regular game settings.

45 minutes ago, Geonovast said:

Advanced Tweakables needs to be on for that.  I believe it's under your difficulty settings?  Might be the regular game settings.

Thanks, that was the problem.
